title: dll cannot run
body: Trying to load League of Legends onto a friends laptop. Originally she had league on it but couldn't patch. When she tried to reinstall she continuously gets a "dll error unable to run". One of the DLLs cannot be run. We have tried running as administrator, uninstalling and removing all league files, and updated her DirectX. Can anyone think of anything to help get league installed? I'm running out of ideas.

replies.body: I'll need a screenshot of the error to specifically know what's going on. Do you think you could have her make her own post here on the boards so it's easier to get information?

Hi!  I am the friend whose laptop is being feisty and thank you for your help.  Below is a link to a screenshot for your reference:

[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/ay14lw.jpg[/IMG]

:)

Gotcha. Thanks for providing that screenshot!

I'd recommend reinstalling using [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) or by grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) After booting up the app, check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall* then hit the **Start** button.

Let me know if this resolved your issues.
